template.name: hz.all
template.description: add compile time dependency for Hazelcast-all jar

template.name: icity
myrunner
servicetime
collectJars
template.description: collect all project jars in dependencies folder

template.name: cs
csb
launch
csbench
populate
listen
register_list
cstream
template.value: count = source.entrySet().parallelStream() .flatMap(m -> java.util.stream.Stream.of(PATTERN.split(m.getValue()))) .map(com.hazelcast.util.WordUtil::cleanWord) .map(java.lang.String::toLowerCase) .filter(m -> m.length() >= 5) .collect(toMap( k -> k, v -> 1, (l, r) -> l + r ));
